item.title: W.Va. Gov. Morrisey to Newsmax: Gender Specific Sports 'Basic Common Sense'
item.description: Republican West Virginia Gov. Patrick Morrisey told Newsmax that keeping men and women separate in sports competition is "basic common sense."
